section.name: AndroMDA Meta Cartridge
section.p: The purpose of this cartridge is to generate AndroMDA metafacades. Metafacades are the object-oriented API that allows access to the model from within the templates. Using metafacades, the templates become much simpler and straightforward because the intelligence and responsibility for code transformation and generation is centralized in Java objects, not in the template script language.
To learn how to use this cartridge, please see the Modeling and Namespace sections.
